akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary shall submit a report to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation of the Senate and the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology of the House of Representatives not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of the U.S. Commercial Space Launch Competitiveness Act, and annually thereafter, on—
(b) Each report under subsection (a) may include classified annexes as necessary to protect the disclosure of sensitive or classified information.
(c) The reporting requirement under this section terminates effective September 30, 2020.
